free_text.Learning outcomes: Familiarize the student with integrated process development and industrial technologies.
free_text.Content: [b]Optimization[/b][br/][br/][li] Influence of process modifications[br/][br/][li] Risk analysis introduction[br/][br/][li] Optimum choice[br/][br/][li] Development program definition[br/][br/][li] Use of process simulation software[br/][br/][li] Scale down & scale up

en.title: Process development II
en.library_recommends: • "Analysis, synthesis and design of chemical processes / Richard Turton ... [et al.]". Year:2007. ISBN:0-13-064792-6
